```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
games <- read_csv("https://thescoop.org/sports-data-files/cbblogs1524.csv")
```

```{r}
Seton_Hall <- games |>
  filter(TeamFull == "Seton Hall Pirates", Date <= "2022-03-05")

Maryland <- games |>
  filter(TeamFull == "Maryland Terrapins", Date >= "2022-11-07")
```
